amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for ATF by 20 percent or $250 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for BATF salaries and expenses by $250 million (20 percent).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A033) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A033) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. Byrne.
